title: The 14 best hidden gems on the high street this season
text:
The high street may be faced with unprecedented challenges this winter, from a general slow-down in clothing consumption (although not at all chains; Primark was up 4 per cent in the last quarter; Asos is recovering too) to the flight online. Added to that; an inchoate sense of guilt in some consumers that the high street is one big evil landfill waiting to happen (not all consumers however; an Oxfam study released last month revealed that half of the 1000 people it surveyed had no idea of fast fashion’s impact on the environment).

For retailers, it’s Darwinian out there. But what’s tough for the high street is good for customers. The best high street companies are fighting back with eye catching...
